name: v8-profiler-lambda
description: node bindings for the v8 profiler compiled for AWS Lambda
author: IOpipe Team

scripts.install: node-pre-gyp install --target=4.8.0 --target_arch=x64 --target_platform=linux --fallback-to-build; mkdir -p ../v8-profiler/build/profiler/v5.7.0/node-v46-linux-x64; cp build/profiler/v5.7.0/node-v46-linux-x64/profiler.node ../v8-profiler/build/profiler/v5.7.0/node-v46-linux-x64/profiler.node; node-pre-gyp install --target=6.10.0 --target_arch=x64 --target_platform=linux --fallback-to-build; mkdir -p ../v8-profiler/build/profiler/v5.7.0/node-v48-linux-x64; cp build/profiler/v5.7.0/node-v48-linux-x64/profiler.node ../v8-profiler/build/profiler/v5.7.0/node-v48-linux-x64/profiler.node;
